values.ctor:
<init>(isDaemon: Boolean)
            Creates a new timer whose associated thread may be specified to Thread#setDaemon.

<init>(name: String!)
            Creates a new timer whose associated thread has the specified name.

<init>(name: String!, isDaemon: Boolean)
            Creates a new timer whose associated thread has the specified name, and may be specified to Thread#setDaemon.

values.desc: Terminates this timer, discarding any currently scheduled tasks.
Removes all cancelled tasks from this timer's task queue.
Schedules the specified task for execution after the specified delay.
Schedules the specified task for execution at the specified time.

values.code: schedule(task: TimerTask!, delay: Long, period: Long)
values.desc: Schedules the specified task for repeated fixed-delay execution, beginning after the specified delay.

values.code: schedule(task: TimerTask!, firstTime: Date!, period: Long)
values.desc: Schedules the specified task for repeated fixed-delay execution, beginning at the specified time.

values.code: scheduleAtFixedRate(task: TimerTask!, delay: Long, period: Long)
values.desc: Schedules the specified task for repeated fixed-rate execution, beginning after the specified delay.

values.code: scheduleAtFixedRate(task: TimerTask!, firstTime: Date!, period: Long)
values.desc: Schedules the specified task for repeated fixed-rate execution, beginning at the specified time.
